about_the_game:
Welcome to Astra Intra, a captivating text-based management game set in the void of space. Embark on a journey as the AI commander of a spaceship, responsible for the survival of a courageous crew as they navigate through the vastness of the universe towards the hope for a new home.

Features:
  • Manage your crew by issuing orders, addressing conflicts and balancing the physical and mental well-being of your team.
  • Encounter a variety of events that force you to make crucial choices, all for the success of the mission.
  • This is intended to be a short experience that can be replayed with different results.

Gameplay:
As the AI commander, you'll oversee the day-to-day operations of the spaceship. Assign tasks to your crew, such as resource management and repair. Keep a close eye on their physical and mental well-being, ensuring they have sufficient energy, food, and emotional support. Beware of the ever-increasing stress levels, as prolonged exposure to pressure and uncertainty can lead to unexpected consequences. Be prepared to make tough decisions to ensure the survival of your crew until they reach their potential new home.

Story:
Earth finds itself trapped in an icy tomb, and humanity's survival hangs by a thread. In a desperate bid to find a habitable planet, a courageous crew is launched towards what might be a habitable planet aboard a spaceship. As time passes, the crew faces not only the challenges of space travel but also mental stress. As the commander, will you guide them to their new home or let them drown in endless void?

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains intese psychological themes, distressing scenarios, and occasional unsettling imagery (in text form). As the game unfolds, the crew's mental and emotional state deteriorate, which might lead to distressing scenarios.
